content: July 8 Northern California power and gas company Pacific Gas & Electric (PG&E) said on Friday its McDonald Island gas storage facility in San Joaquin County remained out of service after the company detected small methane leaks from some of its wells in June.
name: Pacific Gas & Electric Co
title: CORRECTED-PG&E California natgas storage facility shut due to small leaks

content: June 21 California's only functioning nuclear power plant will close by 2025 and be replaced by renewables  energy efficiency and storage under an agreement announced on Tuesday by its owner  PG&E Corp  labor unions and environmental groups.
name: Pacific Gas & Electric Co
title: California's last operating nuclear power plant to close by 2025

content: WARSAW  Sept 2 Poland's biggest power firm PGE  may consider selling its telecom business as part of a divestment plan designed to cope with rising CO2 emission costs and tough competition  Puls Biznesu quoted Chief Executive Marek Woszczyk as saying on Wednesday.
name: Pacific Gas & Electric Co
title: Poland's PGE may sell telecoms unit-Puls Biznesu

content: WARSAW  Aug 31 Poland's biggest power producer PGE posted a net loss of 5.06 billion zlotys ($1.34 billion) in the first half of 2015 because of the 8.8 billion zlotys impairment charge it announced last week  the company said late on Monday.
name: Pacific Gas & Electric Co
title: Poland's PGE confirms H1 net loss of $1.34 bln

content: WARSAW  July 22 Poland has persuaded at least three major companies to contribute to a bailout of troubled coal miner Kompania Weglowa  despite some executives' misgivings about the commercial logic of getting involved  sources with knowledge of the matter said.
name: Pacific Gas & Electric Co
title: UPDATE 1-Poland persuades three blue-chip firms to help rescue coal sector: sources

content: WARSAW  July 22 Polish copper miner KGHM   utility PGE and chemicals firm Grupa Azoty  have offered to contribute to a state-run fund which will be used  in part  to bail out troubled coal miners  sources with knowledge of the matter said.
name: Pacific Gas & Electric Co
title: Poland's PGE  KGHM  Azoty to help in mine bailout:sources

content: WARSAW  July 6 The European Investment Bank (EIB) is in advanced talks to lend more than 2 billion zlotys ($526 million) to Poland's biggest power producer PGE  to help finance its investments  the head of the EIB's Warsaw office told Reuters.
name: Pacific Gas & Electric Co
title: CORRECTED-EIB in talks to lend more than $500 mln to Polish power firm PGE

content: WARSAW  July 8 Poland's biggest power producer PGE could transfer its telecom arm Exatel to a special fund managed by state investment vehicle PIR to help it raise rescue funds for troubled miner Kompania Weglowa  Puls Biznesu daily said.
name: Pacific Gas & Electric Co
title: Poland's PGE to offer telecom arm to KW miner rescue fund-Puls Biznesu

content: WARSAW  July 6 The European Investment Bank (EIB) is in advanced talks to lend more than 2 billion zlotys ($526 million) to Poland's biggest power producer PGE  to help finance its investments  the head of the EIB's Warsaw office told Reuters.
name: Pacific Gas & Electric Co
title: EIB in talks to lend more than $500 mln to Polish power firm PGE

content: BIELSKO-BIALA  Poland  June 29 Poland plans to trim its stakes at state-controlled bank PKO BP  insurer PZU and power producer PGE by end-October to provide financing for the state investment vehicle Polskie Inwestycje  the treasury minister said.
name: Pacific Gas & Electric Co
title: Poland to trim stakes in PKO  PZU and PGE by end-October - minister

content: WARSAW  May 12 Poland's biggest power producer PGE has extended the maintenance at its 858 megawatt (MW) lignite coal-fuelled unit at the Belchatow power plant for 20 hours until Tuesday midnight  data from the Polish power exchange showed.
name: Pacific Gas & Electric Co
title: Poland's PGE extends outage at 858 MW Belchatow unit by 20 hours

content: April 15 The following bids  mergers  acquisitions and disposals were reported by 1330 GMT on Wednesday:
name: Pacific Gas & Electric Co
title: Deals of the day- Mergers and acquisitions

content: WARSAW  April 14 Plans to build Poland's first nuclear power plant will be delayed by at least another two years  sources said  after the decision late last year by state-run utility PGE to take on site research itself and cancel a consultancy contract.
name: Pacific Gas & Electric Co
title: Poland's nuclear project pushed back at least another 2 years: sources

content: * Company cites numerous safety improvements since blast   (Adds PG&E still faces trial on criminal charges  more than $1 billion in penalties if convicted; adds civil settlements; utility's new safety measures)
name: Pacific Gas & Electric Co
title: UPDATE 2-PG&E fined record $1.6 bln for deadly California pipeline blast

content: WARSAW  March 11 Poland will unveil details of its plan to consolidate the country's four biggest power firms - PGE  Tauron  Enea and Energa  - by mid 2015  the treasury minister supervising the industry told Reuters.
name: Pacific Gas & Electric Co
title: Poland to unveil power sector consolidation plan by mid-2015 -minister
